- What changed?
- Why was it needed?

## Type of change

- [ ] Bug fix

## Checklist

- [ ] I tested the change locally
- [ ] I ran `./gradlew :app:compileDebugKotlin --no-daemon`
- [ ] I ran `./gradlew :app:testDebugUnitTest --no-daemon`
- [ ] I added/updated screenshots for UI changes
- [ ] I did not commit secrets or private iCal links

- Any sync, reminder, widget, or migration risks?
